segments.text: What do you want to eat today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel like having some dumplings . Let's go out to eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No need ! I know how to make dumplings . Let's do it from scratch . Can you give me a hand in the kitchen ? I don't think I can finish everything by myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . What do you want me to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just trim vegetables for cooking . I will cut up the meat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can do that . And I would like to make dumplings later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you are my good helper , Steven .
segments.speaker: S1
